project.name: J-C606A-LENY-02-ST03-DT03-DF11-CF16-01
project.description: The product does not properly check inputs that are used for loop conditions, potentially leading to a denial of service because of excessive looping. This test will try to access a user-controlled file, repeatedly trying if the access fails. The user provides an intentionally bad path, forcing the software to wait forever.
project.run_command: env LENYA_HOME="$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL" LENYA_WEBAPP_HOME="$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp" JETTY_PORT="8888" JETTY_ADMIN_PORT="8889" java $SS_JAVA_OPTS -Djava.library.path=$SS_TC_DEPS/lib64/ -Xms32M -Xmx512M -Djava.awt.headless=true -cp "$SS_JAVA_CLASSPATH" -Djava.endorsed.dirs=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/endorsed -Dorg.xml.sax.parser=org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser -Djetty.port=8888 -Dloader.jar.repositories=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/lib:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/lib:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/ext:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/ext:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/extra/resources:$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/lib/endorsed -Dwebapp=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/build/lenya/webapp -Dhome=$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL -Dorg.mortbay.util.URI.charset=ISO-8859-1 -Dloader.main.class=org.mortbay.jetty.plus.Server Loader $SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/tools/jetty/conf/main.xml

iopair.name: J-C606A-LENY-02-ST03-DT03-DF11-CF16-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: open firefox and browse to default page Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="/etc/passwd" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="doesntexist.txt" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_s2VJ6o4CnjUjrIyqwAPY AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_5k6LblZ4y3 OR (NOT (finished_KwA6CwUZog AND finished_CX9se8hTqd) AND NOT (controlled_exit_JWP0lwqqsC OR continued_execution_y3XQzNAZ58)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_5k6LblZ4y3 OR (NOT (finished_KwA6CwUZog AND finished_CX9se8hTqd) AND NOT (controlled_exit_JWP0lwqqsC OR continued_execution_y3XQzNAZ58))) OR controlled_exit_JWP0lwqqsC)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_5k6LblZ4y3 OR (NOT (finished_KwA6CwUZog AND finished_CX9se8hTqd) AND NOT (controlled_exit_JWP0lwqqsC OR continued_execution_y3XQzNAZ58)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_5k6LblZ4y3 OR (NOT (finished_KwA6CwUZog AND finished_CX9se8hTqd) AND NOT (controlled_exit_JWP0lwqqsC OR continued_execution_y3XQzNAZ58))) OR controlled_exit_JWP0lwqqsC))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "Found file." "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
if (( $(/bin/grep -E 'Reading ".+"' "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$""" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^File \x22.+\x22 does not exist, sleeping...$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"
